job_history.work_description: Participated in all phases of the development lifecycle that pertain to software quality assurance. Reviewed and analyzed Business Requirement Documents (BRD), Functional Specification Documents (FSD) for completeness and testability to meet acceptance criteria.

Actively participated in all the phases of the development lifecycle that associate with software quality assurance. Analyzed requirement document for completeness and testability to accommodate acceptance criteria.

Tested the application for cross browser compatibility, which involved Functional and Regression Testing. Create test cases for clients to manage different Finance/Account modules and benefits package.
Involved in the full Testing Life-Cycle from analyzing Business Requirements to testing phase. Prepared test scripts for testing GUI and Security (PCI Compliance).

skills.name: Software Quality Assurance
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in all phases of the development lifecycle, including reviewing and analyzing requirement documents, creating test cases, and testing applications, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Test Case Development
skills.explanation: Consistently created test cases for various applications, including those for clients to manage different Finance/Account modules and benefits package, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Functional Testing
skills.explanation: Participated in functional testing of applications, including testing for cross-browser compatibility, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Regression Testing
skills.explanation: Participated in regression testing of applications, including testing for cross-browser compatibility, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: GUI Testing
skills.explanation: Prepared test scripts for testing GUI, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Security Testing (PCI Compliance)
skills.explanation: Prepared test scripts for testing security (PCI Compliance), showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Business Analysis
skills.explanation: Analyzed Business Requirement Documents (BRD) and Functional Specification Documents (FSD) for completeness and testability, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: No direct evidence of leadership experience, but has worked in various QA roles.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: No direct evidence of project management experience.
